item.title: Star Wars: Episode VII, The Force Awakens
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: I really enjoyed it, totally recommend watching it. No doubt that a large part of what carried this movie is nostalgia, it was fun to see what some of the original characters are up to all these years later. Beyond that though, the feel of the movie and the story were solid Star Wars. If […]
item.content:encoded:
I really enjoyed it, totally recommend watching it.

No doubt that a large part of what carried this movie is nostalgia, it was fun to see what some of the original characters are up to all these years later. Beyond that though, the feel of the movie and the story were solid Star Wars.

If you’ve seen the movie already go read The Force Awakens was awesome and I loved it.

item.title: Groundhog Day

item.title: Speckle May
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Since seeing the first commercial for Despicable Me the kids have been talking about wanting to see it. My four year old couldn’t quite get the words right though, they came out as “Speckle May”. It’s become the family phrase now, at random times during the day someone will exclaim “Speckle May!” for no apparent […]
item.content:encoded: Since seeing the first commercial for Despicable Me the kids have been talking about wanting to see it. My four year old couldn’t quite get the words right though, they came out as “Speckle May”. It’s become the family phrase now, at random times during the day someone will exclaim “Speckle May!” for no apparent reason

item.title: The Perfect Ending For The New ‘G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra’ Movie
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Sarah and I were talking about some of the movies that are coming out this summer, including G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra. Although G.I. Joe has a long history, my only memories were of the cartoon in the mid-80s. Then it hit me, I know the perfect ending for the new G.I. Joe movie! […]
item.content:encoded:
Sarah and I were talking about some of the movies that are coming out this summer, including G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra. Although G.I. Joe has a long history, my only memories were of the cartoon in the mid-80s. Then it hit me, I know the perfect ending for the new G.I. Joe movie!

If they’re smart they’ll leave this super special ending until after all of the credits have scrolled by:
